SEARCH
Package org.apache.commons.dbcp2

Interface PoolableConnectionMXBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
PoolableConnection, PoolableManagedConnection
public interface PoolableConnectionMXBean
Defines the attributes and methods that will be exposed via JMX for PoolableConnection instances.
Since:
2.0

  • Method Details

    • clearCachedState

      void clearCachedState()
      Clears the cached state. Call when you know that the underlying connection may have been accessed directly.

    • clearWarnings

      void clearWarnings() throws SQLException
      See Connection.clearWarnings().
      Throws:
      SQLException - See Connection.clearWarnings().

    • close

      void close() throws SQLException
      Returns this instance to my containing pool.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Throw if this instance cannot be returned.

    • getAutoCommit

      boolean getAutoCommit() throws SQLException
      See Connection.getAutoCommit().
      Returns:
      See Connection.getAutoCommit().
      Throws:
      SQLException - See Connection.getAutoCommit().

    • getCacheState

      boolean getCacheState()
      Gets whether to cache properties. The cached properties are:
      • auto-commit
      • catalog
      • schema
      • read-only
      Returns:
      The value for the state caching flag.

    • getToString

      String getToString()
      Gets the value of the Object.toString() method via a bean getter, so it can be read as a property via JMX.
      Returns:
      the value of the Object.toString().

    • reallyClose

      void reallyClose() throws SQLException
      Closes the underlying Connection.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if the connection can be closed.

    • setCacheState

      void setCacheState(boolean cacheState)
      Sets whether to cache properties. The cached properties are:
      • auto-commit
      • catalog
      • schema
      • read-only
      Parameters:
      cacheState - The new value for the state caching flag
